name: Gift: Ignis
description:
webgl seems to be a bit weird, so the tutorial might bug out.

Controls:

 A or D for movement; 

Spacebar for jump; 

LMB for hit(you can also hold it for a more powerful attack); 

E to spend 500 points to add 5 seconds to campfire

F to spend 5000*(upgrade lvl) to increase damage(Because enemy HP scales with time)

R to restart

Enemies(and ways to kill them):

Tree - common hit

Slime - 2 common hits or 1 strong hit

Present - 1 strong hit, will blow up if it isn't killed in 1 hit

In order to kill flying enemies you have to stand on another enemy and time your jump

Holding an attack will also grant double the points.

There is also enemy scaling which means, that you need +1 dmg on enemy level 3 to kill  the present
